Package net.acperience.cloudplayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbManager
    A singleton database manager that handles operations with the database.
    FileManager
    File manager class to take care of uploading to the current user's bucket Each instance of the class is tied to a Servlet
    KerberosAuth
    An abstract wrapper class to perform Kerberos authentication using Java.
    MusicKerberos
    An implementation of KerberosAuth specific to this application.
    MusicUtility
    Utility class providing convenience methods.
    ServletAuth
    Servlet that handles the authentication of the user.
    ServletJSON
    Servlet that provides the JSON data requested by the HTML client provided by ServletMain.
    ServletMain
    Outputs the HTML client to the user's browser.
    ServletStream
    Handles the streaming of music files.
    ServletUpload
    Handles upload of music files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileManager.JPlayerMapping
    Enumeration to map file extensions to JPlayer Attribute Names
